About HarvestSphere

HarvestSphere is a mobile application designed to empower farmers and agricultural enthusiasts with essential tools and information for modern farming practices. The app provides a user-friendly interface that enables farmers to make informed decisions, optimize crop yields, and manage their agricultural activities effectively.

Key Features:

Crop Information: Detailed information on a wide range of crops, including optimal growing conditions, soil requirements, and pest management.

Weather Updates: Real-time weather forecasts and alerts to help farmers plan their activities.

Market Prices: Up-to-date information on market prices for various crops, helping farmers get the best value for their produce.
